title: What bothers Gen Z most at work? Imbalance, micromanagers, and no growth

title: ‘Stop coding’, says Nvidia CEO to engineers; says this is what they should do instead
description: Nvidia's CEO Jensen Huang aims for engineers to code zero percent, leveraging AI assistants like Cursor to tackle complex, undiscovered problems. He believes this 'Purpose vs Task' approach, akin to radiology's evolution, will elevate human roles. While some, like Cursor's CEO, caution against unchecked AI development, Huang remains confident in this human-centric future for innovation.

title: Watch: Air India plane engine damaged after it sucks in container
description: Air India's Airbus A350, en route to New York, returned to Delhi due to Iranian airspace closure. Subsequently, while taxiing in dense fog, an unsecured container was ingested into its right engine. The aircraft is now grounded for repairs, impacting Air India's widebody capacity and highlighting airside safety concerns.

Popular Chennai-based singer, Saindhavi, has just seen two radically different musical stages: Carnatic music performances at Chennai’s sabhas during the Margazhi season, and performing at actor Vijay’s ‘Jana Nayagan’ musical event in Malaysia.

title: Older than Milky Way: Scientists study signals older than 13 billion years — what they reveal
description: Scientists have detected ancient microwave signals from the universe's early days. These signals, over 13 billion years old, offer insights into the Cosmic Dawn. They reveal how the first structures influenced light left over from the Big Bang. This groundbreaking detection was made using Earth-based telescopes. It challenges previous assumptions about where such observations could be made.

title: Bulldozers clearing bodies from streets: Iranians in India reveal horror of deadly protests
description: Reports from Iran paint a grim picture: overflowing hospitals, streets cleared by earthmovers, and families charged for their children's bullets. Protests have morphed into a struggle for survival, with citizens facing severe economic hardship and brutal crackdowns. Iranians abroad are raising their voices, seeking support and highlighting the dire situation back home.

title: Zuckerberg hired Wang for $14B, now they're clashing: AI team in chaos; new boss moves in
description: Meta's new structure reveals tension between Mark Zuckerberg and Alexandr Wang, the $14 billion AI recruit. Wang finds Zuckerberg's micromanagement stifling, while staff question his leadership for Meta's AI ambitions. A recent strategy clash highlighted differing priorities, with Wang pushing for cutting-edge AI over immediate product integration.

title: Patrick Mahomes stays low-key as Brittany Mahomes marks milestone amid recovery doubts
description: Patrick Mahomes is staying largely out of the public eye as he continues his rehab following a season-ending knee injury. While his recovery timeline remains uncertain, his wife Brittany recently shared a family milestone, drawing attention to the quieter phase of Mahomes’ career as he balances healing, home life, and preparation for his return.

title: Travis Kelce makes emotional life choice with Taylor Swift amid retirement buzz
description: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce are currently gearing up for their lavish wedding which is all set to be held this summer. Amid wedding plans, Travis Kelce is also dealing with strong retirement rumors as fans continue to troll his performance in the ongoing season. It seems this has influenced Travis Kelce to make a pretty heartfelt decision about his life.
